resources.string: Blitz Boba breaks cultural barriers by creating unique drinks and bringing American and Asian together. We strive to not only make high quality boba drinks, but also to serve the Las Vegas community!

SIGNATURES Mint Mojito Milk Tea OG milk tea with a hint of mint Horchata Traditional Mexican cinnamon rice water Coconut Thai Tea Thai tea with all-natural coconut milk Oreo Milk Tea OG milk tea with Oreo crumbles SLUSHES Rare Candy Caramel Apple Yeet-che SMOOTHIES Honeydew Strawberry Peach Orange Creamsicle Taro TOPPINGS Boba Mini Boba Lychee Jelly Rainbow Jelly
